sources.title: Stand-In
sources.description: Title: Stand-In Summary: A New York bank plans to sell a Hollywood studio at a big loss. But the head accountant is suspicious and goes to investigate. He finds chicanery, romance, and help to save the studio. Directed by: Tay Garnett. Actors: Leslie Howard, Humphrey Bogart, Joan Blondell Production Company: Walter Wanger Productions Release Date: 29 October 1937 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Color: Black and White Atterbury Dodd is an efficiency expert who believes everything can be reduced to mathematics. He is sent to Hollywood to see whether Colossal Pictures is a good investment. He soon learns that movie production doesn't fit his formulaic mindset.

metadata.Plot: Atterbury Dodd is an efficiency expert who believes everything can be reduced to mathematics. He is sent to Hollywood to see whether Colossal Pictures is a good investment. He soon learns that movie production doesn't fit his formulaic mindset.
